name: Keeper of the worlds
description:
You are Spirit. Keeper of the worlds.

Collect all magic plants and bring them to monument in corruption world to avoid evil creature corrupt all of the worlds.

Controls:
Q - go to corruption world
E - interact (collect and place).
WASD - walk.
Space - jump.

v0.0.2 update:
Fixed bugs
- Corruption bridge collider fix
- Game now has "ending" when you bring all plants to monument
- Fixed randomization of next world, now you spawn only in worlds where you didn't collect the plant
